member.name: M:Cake.Core.Scripting.ScriptHostMetadata.Setup(System.Action)
member.summary: Allows registration of an action that's executed before any tasks are run. If setup fails, no tasks will be executed but teardown will be performed.

member.name: M:Cake.Core.Scripting.ScriptHostMetadata.TaskSetup(System.Action{Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.ITaskSetupContext})
member.summary: Allows registration of an action that's executed before each task is run. If the task setup fails, its task will not be executed but the task teardown will be performed.

member.name: M:Cake.Core.Scripting.ScriptHostMetadata.TaskTeardown(System.Action{Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.ITaskTeardownContext})
member.summary: Allows registration of an action that's executed after each task has been run. If a task setup action or a task fails with or without recovery, the specified task teardown action will still be executed.

member.name: M:Cake.Core.Scripting.ScriptHostMetadata.Teardown(System.Action)
member.summary: Allows registration of an action that's executed after all other tasks have been run. If a setup action or a task fails with or without recovery, the specified teardown action will still be executed.
